name: Alone (itch) (SectorCodec)
description:
Runner Up for the MindStorm Game Jam.

Theme: Illusions

Instruction

You are stranded on an island and due to being alone, your sanity is decreasing. So you have to make your self numb by taking all the emotions out and make an illusion of them. These illusion will gather food for you and will need food to eat them self as well. Happy Illusions will gather fast while the sad ones will be slow. Every illusion you create decrease the rate at which the sanity decreases.

You need to manage resources, illusion spawn time and resources.

Press "Space" to spawn illusion.

Press "WASD" to move

Press "E" near tree and bushes to gather resources.
